item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Nicolas Sterchele, I’m living in France with a passion for everything related to OSS. NOOOO, not the famous agent Hubert Bonisseur de La Bath OSS 117 In my day to day job I am a DevOps or an SRE(as you want)… working on reliability, scalability, performance and automation. This blog is about my journey in the open source world, how I live in, how I interact with, how I love it.
